text: Edward L. Sadowsky (February 6, 1929 â€“ November 11, 2021) was an American Democratic politician and lawyer. He was a member of the New York City Council from 1962 to 1989. Sadowsky was born in New York City. Sadowsky died on November 11, 2021 in Beachwood, Ohio from respiratory failure, aged 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Lawyers from New York City
title: Edward L. Sadowsky
